message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to acquire this high-quality product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $12000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to acquire this product. However, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer of $8500, but I'm afraid I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. The product is truly unique and has a lot to offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $9500 for the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer of $10500, but I'm still looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $10000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm thinking $10500 is still a fair price. Can you meet me in the middle at $10250?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer of $10250, but I believe we can come to a mutual agreement at $10000. I hope you can consider this final proposal.

Hi Bob, I've already offered you $10250 and you're still at $10000. I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal. I'm willing to go up to $10500 one last time, but if you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options. What's it going to be?
